deploy.preDeployCommand:
/bin/bash -lc "python manage.py migrate && python manage.py createsuperuser --noinput --username \"$DJANGO_SUPERUSER_USERNAME\" --email \"$DJANGO_SUPERUSER_EMAIL\" || true && python manage.py shell -c 'from django.contrib.auth import get_user_model; import os; User = get_user_model(); username = os.environ.get("DJANGO_SUPERUSER_USERNAME"); password = os.environ.get("DJANGO_SUPERUSER_PASSWORD"); email = os.environ.get("DJANGO_SUPERUSER_EMAIL", "");
if username and password:
    user, _ = User.objects.get_or_create(username=username)
    user.email = email or user.email
    user.is_staff = True
    user.is_superuser = True
    user.set_password(password)
    user.save()
    print("Superuser ensured")'"
